title: Injection Prevention
description: Verify parameterized queries are enforced for all database access.

title: Broken Authentication
description: Confirm MFA and session management policies meet OWASP guidance.

title: Sensitive Data Protection
description: Assess transport encryption strength and secret storage practices.

title: Insecure Design
description: Review threat models and abuse cases for coverage of critical workflows.

title: Security Misconfiguration
description: Check baseline hardening, HTTP headers, and admin surface exposure.

title: Vulnerable Components
description: Ensure SBOM tracking and dependency patch cadence are documented.

title: Identification & AuthZ
description: Exercise horizontal and vertical access controls across roles.

title: Software Integrity
description: Validate signing of releases and CI/CD guardrails for secrets.

title: Logging & Monitoring
description: Confirm log retention, alerting, and anomaly detection for auth events.

title: Server-Side Request Forgery
description: Test SSRF controls, deny-lists, and metadata service hardening.
